name: part_005
file: tmp_【生誕祭】百鬼あやめ 4th Birth Dayライブ!!!!!!!!!!! 　＃百鬼あやめ4th生誕祭 [bn7OaRnM9-A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Stardust Song' by Nakiri Ayame, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Tokoyami Towa.
MC segment featuring Nakiri Ayame, Hoshimachi Suisei, and Tokoyami Towa, discussing their collaboration.
Performance of 'Yume miru sora e' by Nakiri Ayame, Houshou Marine, and Shirogane Noel.

subtitles.original: 今も輝くんだスターダストソング
subtitles.english: Even now, it shines, Stardust Song

subtitles.original: カワイイだけじゃもういられない
subtitles.english: I can't just be cute anymore

subtitles.original: 声をあげていくんだスターダストソング
subtitles.english: I'll raise my voice, Stardust Song

subtitles.original: はい！はい！いかがでしたでしょうか
subtitles.english: Yes! Yes! How was it?

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと可愛い可愛い
subtitles.english: It was kinda cute, cute

subtitles.original: そんな盛り方するの？
subtitles.english: You're hyping it up like that?

subtitles.original: ねえ、あやめちゃんのこと好きってよ！
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm saying I like Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: あ、すみませんすみませんということで、ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Ah, excuse me, excuse me, so, thank you very much

subtitles.original: 今日はね、いやありがとうございました。すいちゃんとトワちゃんに来ていただけました！
subtitles.english: Today, well, thank you so much. Suisei-chan and Towa-chan could come!

subtitles.original: 来ましたー！わー！
subtitles.english: We came! Yay!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 今日はですね、あの最近ヨガずっと
subtitles.english: Today, well, recently I've been doing yoga...

subtitles.original: トワちゃんとすいちゃんとおかゆでスターダストソング踊ってたやつをね
subtitles.english: The one where Towa-chan, Suisei-chan, and Okayu were dancing to Stardust Song...

subtitles.original: はい、はいはい
subtitles.english: Yes, yes yes

subtitles.original: 一生聴いてて
subtitles.english: I've been listening to it non-stop

subtitles.original: めっちゃかっこいいと思って、おかゆはちょっと別の曲で歌ってもらおうと思って
subtitles.english: Thinking it's so cool, I thought I'd have Okayu sing a different song

subtitles.original: はい
subtitles.english: Yes

subtitles.original: この二人とね、乗っかってスターダストソング一緒に踊りたい、歌いたいと思って
subtitles.english: I thought I wanted to join these two and dance and sing Stardust Song together

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 呼んでもらった！
subtitles.english: We were invited!

subtitles.original: 今日来ていただきました！
subtitles.english: They came today!

subtitles.original: やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: いやでも本当に、あやめちゃんから声かけてもらえるとは思わなくて
subtitles.english: No, but seriously, I didn't think I'd get a call from Ayame-chan

subtitles.original: 思わなくて！
subtitles.english: Didn't think so!

subtitles.original: トワさん？
subtitles.english: Towa-san?

subtitles.original: トワさん？同じこと思った
subtitles.english: Towa-san? I thought the same thing

subtitles.original: あやめちゃんが誘ってくれると思ってなくて
subtitles.english: I didn't expect Ayame-chan to invite me

subtitles.original: え、うそー！
subtitles.english: Eh, no way!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、心臓バクバクだったの。だって初めてじゃん
subtitles.english: Today, my heart was pounding. Because it's the first time, right?

subtitles.original: あ、そうそう
subtitles.english: Ah, right, right

subtitles.original: すいちゃんとはマジで初めて、こう3Dライブでね
subtitles.english: With Suisei-chan, it's really the first time in a 3D live like this

subtitles.original: そうそうそう
subtitles.english: Right, right, right

subtitles.original: 一緒にこう3人でやるみたいな
subtitles.english: Doing it together as three like this

subtitles.original: そうそうないない
subtitles.english: Yeah, there hasn't been

subtitles.original: トワちゃんは、あの、何だっけ、丸山？
subtitles.english: Towa-chan, well, what was it, Maruyama?

subtitles.original: 丸山、うん
subtitles.english: Maruyama, yeah

subtitles.original: あったけど、でもこうやって歌うのは初めてじゃない？
subtitles.english: We had that, but it's the first time singing like this, right?

subtitles.original: ねえ、めっちゃ緊張したの。誘って大丈夫？って
subtitles.english: Hey, I was so nervous. Like, 'is it okay to invite them?'

subtitles.original: ありがとう、あやめちゃんみたいなレアキャラに
subtitles.english: Thank you, to a rare character like Ayame-chan

subtitles.original: ねえ、レアキャラにね
subtitles.english: Yeah, a rare character

subtitles.original: やめてよ！えー、いいじゃん可愛い
subtitles.english: Stop it! Eh, it's fine, you're cute

subtitles.original: どうしたの
subtitles.english: What's wrong?

subtitles.original: うわー
subtitles.english: Uwaa

subtitles.original: うわーって何
subtitles.english: What do you mean 'Uwaa'?

subtitles.original: え、違うの。もうなんか、本当は断られるかもってちょっとめちゃ胃がキリキリしながら言ったの
subtitles.english: Eh, no. I was like, actually, they might refuse, so my stomach was churning while I said it

subtitles.original: いやいやいや
subtitles.english: No, no, no

subtitles.original: ちょっと悩んだけどね
subtitles.english: I hesitated a bit, though

subtitles.original: 悩んだ？
subtitles.english: You hesitated?

subtitles.original: いやー！って言ったでしょ
subtitles.english: I said 'No way!', didn't I?

subtitles.original: いやいやいや、もう普通に、でもめっちゃ早くなかった？返事
subtitles.english: No, no, it was normal, but wasn't the reply super fast?

subtitles.original: 乗る！って
subtitles.english: I'm in!

subtitles.original: 二人ともね、めっちゃ早かったの
subtitles.english: Both of them were super fast

subtitles.original: ほら！
subtitles.english: See!

subtitles.original: トワちゃん何か2日3日ぐらい寝かされるかなと思ったんだけど
subtitles.english: I thought Towa-chan might let it sit for 2 or 3 days

subtitles.original: いやもう即答だった、朝起きて、お、あやめちゃんから来てると思って
subtitles.english: No, it was an instant reply, I woke up in the morning and saw 'Oh, it's from Ayame-chan'

subtitles.original: そうそう、即答で「いいよ」って言ってくれて
subtitles.english: Right, right, she replied instantly saying 'Okay'

subtitles.original: 感動したの
subtitles.english: I was moved

subtitles.original: ほらやりたがってるでしょ
subtitles.english: See, they wanted to do it

subtitles.original: 冗談冗談
subtitles.english: Just kidding, just kidding

subtitles.original: ということでですね、本日はありがとうございました
subtitles.english: So, thank you very much for today

subtitles.original: あ、こちらこそありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you as well

subtitles.original: お時間みたいなんで
subtitles.english: Looks like our time is up

subtitles.original: はい、すいちゃんこの辺で帰るか
subtitles.english: Yes, Suisei-chan, shall we head out?

subtitles.original: はい、失礼いたします
subtitles.english: Yes, excuse us

subtitles.original: じゃあね、さよなら、バイバイ、頑張って！
subtitles.english: See ya, goodbye, bye-bye, good luck!

subtitles.original: こんな終わり方すんの？頑張れ！
subtitles.english: It ends like this? Good luck!

subtitles.original: いやめっちゃ雑なんだけど。大丈夫かな
subtitles.english: Wow, that was so blunt. I wonder if it's okay

subtitles.original:
夢見る空へ
作詞：永塚健登 作曲：永塚健登
subtitles.english:
To the Dreaming Sky
Lyrics: Kento Nagatsuka, Composition: Kento Nagatsuka

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はギュッと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our joined hands tightly without letting go

subtitles.original: 行くよ 行こう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's go, to the dreaming sky

subtitles.original: 窓越しに見上げた
subtitles.english: Looking up through the window

subtitles.original: とても小さな空
subtitles.english: At a very small sky

subtitles.original: ここで出会えたのは
subtitles.english: That we met here

subtitles.original: 数え切れない奇跡
subtitles.english: Is a countless miracle

subtitles.original: 繰り返した一歩が
subtitles.english: Each repeated step

subtitles.original: 煌めきを繋いで
subtitles.english: Connects the sparkles

subtitles.original: 星のような笑顔 導いた
subtitles.english: A smile like a star guided us

subtitles.original: Day by Day
subtitles.english: Day by Day

subtitles.original: みんなの声が力になる
subtitles.english: Everyone's voice becomes our strength

subtitles.original: Stage by Stage
subtitles.english: Stage by Stage

subtitles.original: ここでそれぞれ目指すもの
subtitles.english: What each of us aims for here

subtitles.original: それぞれ描くもの
subtitles.english: What each of us draws

subtitles.original: それぞれ願った夢へ
subtitles.english: To the dreams we each wished for

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はギュッと離さずに
subtitles.english: Holding our joined hands tightly without letting go

subtitles.original: ひとりひとり違う色で
subtitles.english: Each one with a different color

subtitles.original: 咲き誇るトキメキ
subtitles.english: A throb of excitement in full bloom

subtitles.original: 振り向くことなくまっすぐに
subtitles.english: Straight ahead without looking back

subtitles.original: 行くよ 行こう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's go, to the dreaming sky
